thread.title: King Rice gives positive reaction on black UNC jerseys
thread.title_full: King Rice gives positive reaction on black UNC jerseys

author: app.com
title: King Rice gives positive reaction on black UNC jerseys
text:
MORE WEST LONG BRANCH – From the classic white and Carolina blue colors, to the argyle pattern going down the sides, the University of North Carolina’s jerseys are synonymous with college basketball, so when a temporary change was announced on Friday afternoon, it certainly caused a reaction.
Social media was abuzz on Friday afternoon after the school announced it would wear black uniforms for the first time on Dec. 19 when the Tar Heels face UCLA at Barclays Center in Brooklyn. The school’s announcement included a short video of star guard Marcus Paige trying the uniform on for the first time, followed by the senior walking into the locker room and showing it off to his teammates, who were also seeing it for the first time. Judging by the reaction of his teammates, it seems the players like them.
